item.title: Forward Block Sweeps Vaddepalli Municipality in Jogulamba Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[The All India Forward Bloc (AIFB) has secured a decisive victory in Vaddepalli Municipality of Jogulamba Gadwal district. Out of the 10 wards, the Forward Block won 8 seats, while the Congress and BRS secured one seat each.
The winning candidates were backed by Telangana Jagruthi leader K. Kavitha, who extended support to those contesting under the All India Forward Block banner in the municipal elections.
...]]>
item.author: Dc Correspondent, About The Author
